speaker: Clinician
text: So, when you mentioned missing a dose of the warfarin last week, did you notice any changes in how you were feeling, or was everything pretty much the same?

speaker: Patient
text: Uh, I didn't really feel any different, to be honest. My daughter was a bit worried, though, and she made sure I got back on track right away.

speaker: Clinician
text: That's good to hear. It's important to keep it consistent. Have you thought about using a pill organizer or setting reminders on your phone?

speaker: Patient
text: Yeah, she actually got me one of those weekly pill boxes. It's been helpful, but sometimes I just forget to check it.

speaker: Clinician
text: I understand. Maybe we can also look into setting up some alerts on your phone. It might be a good backup plan.

speaker: Patient
text: That sounds like a good idea. I'll ask my daughter to help me with that. She's better with the tech stuff.
